start.text: Under the moonlight, you discover a mysterious tent glowing with dark mana in the middle of the forest. The air feels heavy... as if a powerful demon once stood here.

insideTent.text: Inside the tent, a hidden magic circle activates beneath your feet. The ground opens, revealing a forbidden dungeon filled with ancient mana crystals.

deepForest.text: You step away from the tent, but the forest grows darker. Shadows move unnaturally. You sense hostile magic beasts watching you.

dungeonGate.text: A massive black gate blocks your path. Strange symbols glow red. You feel overwhelming demonic power behind it.

demonChamber.text: The gate shatters! A demon infused with dark mana appears. Your grimoire suddenly glows, unlocking a hidden anti-magic ability.

finalBattle.text: With anti-magic flowing through you, you slash through the demon's spells and land the final strike. The dungeon collapses, but you survive.

treasure.text: ‚ú® You obtain an ancient grimoire and become a legendary magic knight. Victory is yours!
